column4: I accidentally dragged an image onto the window list toolbar, and now that image is set as the background of the toolbar. How can I reset that to the default background? Changing theme doesn't seem to affect it
secondary-click the toolbar, choose Properties, click the Background tab, then choose None
Wherever I click it I get specific options to that section of the toolbar (like the window list or the clock), nothing with a background option
secondary-click an empty portion of the toolbar
